context.description: This wizard enables you to configure automatic user authentication for your Java web application with Azure Access Control Services, using an authentication filter that will be installed on your server.

topic.label: How to Authenticate Web Users with Azure Access Control Service Using Eclipse

context.description: This dialog allows you to create a new self-signed X.509 certificate that you can use for testing purposes in scenarios involving encryption or digital signing. Two files will be generated: a certificate file with the public key only (*.CER), and a file containing both the private and the public key (*.PFX).

topic.label: Enabling Remote Access in Azure Using Eclipse
